synthesis_conditions.comments: Two-fold interpenetrated with 43.3% guest-accessible volume (GAV) occupied by water and DMF solvent.

synthesis_conditions.activation_conditions: activation at 120 88C results in an irreversible single-crystal to single-crystal transformation
synthesis_conditions.comments: Threefold interpenetrated structure with 17.9% discrete GAV.

synthesis_conditions.activation_conditions: milder activation conditions (80 88C) yields the porous apohost phase without a change in the degree of interpenetration
synthesis_conditions.comments: Twofold interpenetrated structure with approximately the same amount of discrete GAV as threefold interpenetrated 1act1.

synthesis_conditions.activation_conditions: subjected to SCXRD analysis under vacuum using an environmental gas cell
synthesis_conditions.comments: Matches previously reported structure of 1act2; contains no residual electron density.
Methane-loaded crystal structure similar to 1vac2, with only minor differences in the unit cell dimensions.
Inclusion of ethane results in lowering of the symmetry of 1; space to accommodate a pair of ethane molecules.
Retained the same space group and host ASU as 1vac2, but with slightly larger unit cell volumes and an approximately 13088 rotation of the ndc2 ligand.
